description: The ADV_EVT_GRADE_HISTORY table contains historical grade information about adverse event records for a patient.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HX_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the grade of the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Present


Mild


Moderate


Severe


Life-threatening


Death
